TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventLogInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: Allows you to install and configure an event log that your application reads from or writes to when running.

span.span: Allows you to install and configure an event log that your application reads from or writes to when running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)安裝事件記錄檔時。The is used by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) when installing an event log. 類別可以只在本機電腦上安裝事件記錄檔。The class can install event logs only on the local computer. 使用類別，在您的應用程式寫入事件記錄檔，而不需要使用您的應用程式的事件記錄檔安裝程式來讀取事件記錄檔。Use the class when your application writes to an event log; it is not necessary to use an event log installer for your application to read from an event log. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. > [!NOTE] > 安全性記錄檔是唯讀的。The Security log is read-only. 安裝程式會建立您在中指定的事件來源屬性和它的事件記錄檔中指定的暫存器屬性。The installer creates the event source that you specify in the property and registers it for the event log specified in property. 此行為會類似於呼叫上元件。This behavior is similar to calling on the component. 使用和將事件寫入事件記錄檔的方法。Use the and methods to write events to an event log. 您必須指定要寫入事件，事件來源您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source. 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而您嘗試寫入新的來源的事件寫入作業將會失敗。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 您可以設定新的來源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 您可以建立現有的事件記錄檔或新的事件記錄檔的事件來源。You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log. 當您建立新的事件記錄檔的新來源時，系統會註冊為該記錄檔中，來源，但直到第一個項目寫入至其中，才會建立記錄檔。When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 若要安裝的事件記錄檔，建立專案的安裝程式類別繼承自，並設定類別`true`。To install an event log, create a project installer class that inherits from , and set the for the class to `true`. 在您的專案內建立每個事件記錄檔會寫入您的應用程式，並新增至您專案的安裝程式類別的執行個體。Within your project, create an for each event log that your application will write to and add the instance to your project installer class. 當[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)是呼叫，它會查看。When the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) is called, it looks at the . 如果它是`true`，此工具安裝中的所有項目專案安裝程式相關聯的集合。If it is `true`, the tool installs all the items in the collection that are associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`，工具會忽略專案安裝程式。If is `false`, the tool ignores the project installer. 修改的其他屬性之前或之後加入至執行個體專案安裝程式，但安裝程式工具執行前的集合。You modify other properties of an either before or after adding the instance to the collection of your project installer, but before the installer tool runs. 您必須設定屬性，如果您的應用程式會寫入事件記錄檔。You must set the property if your application will be writing to the event log. 使用註冊新的來源，新的或現有事件記錄檔，請勿使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法時擲回例外狀況屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不會註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 您可以在您的事件類別目錄和訊息字串的當地語系化的資源檔註冊事件來源。You can register the event source with localized resource files for your event category and message strings. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄項目使用資源識別碼，而不是指定實際的字串。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers, rather than specifying the actual string. 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 您可以註冊個別的檔案，如事件類別目錄、 訊息和參數插入字串，或您可以註冊相同的資源檔，所有的三種類型的字串。You can register a separate file for event categories, messages, and parameter insertion strings, or you can register the same resource file for all three types of strings. 使用， ， ，和屬性來設定要當地語系化的項目寫入事件記錄檔的來源。Use the , , , and properties to configure the source to write localized entries to the event log. 如果您的應用程式會將字串值，直接寫入事件記錄檔，您不需要設定這些屬性。If your application writes strings values directly to the event log, you do not need to set these properties. 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定的來源。The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources. 比方說，使用資源檔，設定一個來源，然後使用該來源中的方法寫入事件記錄檔的資源識別項的項目。For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log. 建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，然後使用該來源中的方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。Create a different source without resource files and then use that source in the method to write strings directly to the event log using that source. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法類別從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 Installutil.exe。Typically, you do not call the methods of the class from within your code; they are generally called only by Installutil.exe. 此工具會自動呼叫安裝程序期間的方法。The tool automatically calls the method during the installation process. 它會出失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫產生例外狀況之物件的方法。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling the method for the object that generated the exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 在程式碼範例設定的來源名稱和事件記錄檔名稱，並將至集合。The code example sets the source name and the event log name, and adds the to the collection. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/CPP/eventloginstaller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/CS/eventloginstaller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogInstaller/VB/eventloginstaller.vb#1)]

member this.CategoryCount : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.

value.span: 分類資源檔中的類別目錄數目。

span.span: The number of categories in the category resource file.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和屬性，以寫入事件的當地語系化類別目錄字串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果當您撰寫的事件時，會提供類別，事件檢視器會顯示事件項目的類別。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry, if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的字串，用來協助篩選事件，或提供事件相關資訊。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information on an event. 例如，您的應用程式可以定義不同的類別，針對不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件類別目錄都無所謂，如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定和屬性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 在程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和當地語系化的事件文字資源檔。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
The path of the category resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用和屬性，以寫入事件的當地語系化類別目錄字串。Use the and properties to write events with localized category strings. 如果當您撰寫的事件時，會提供類別，事件檢視器會顯示事件項目的類別。The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event. 事件記錄檔分類是應用程式定義的字串，用來幫助篩選事件，或提供事件的相關資訊。Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information about an event. 比方說，您的應用程式可能會有不同的類別，針對不同的元件或不同的作業。For example, your application might have separate categories for different components or different operations. 事件類別目錄都無所謂，如果您的應用程式不會使用類別，請勿設定和屬性。Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the and properties. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 在程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和當地語系化的事件文字資源檔。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: Copies the property values of an component that are required at installation time for an event log.

span.span: Copies the property values of an component that are required at installation time for an event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的元件`component`參數必須是，否則會擲回例外狀況。The component specified by the `component` parameter must be an ; otherwise, an exception is thrown. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). Installutil.exe 使用設定的屬性值的值，將現有的。 is used by Installutil.exe to set the property values for the to the values of an existing . 如果的也就是傳入為空字串 ("")，您必須設定屬性設為有效的值執行安裝程式之前。If the of the that is passed in is an empty string (""), you must set the property to a valid value before the installer executes.

exception.span: The specified component is not an .

span.span: The specified component is not an .

exception.span: -or- The or property of the specified component is either or empty.

span.span: -or- The or property of the specified component is either or empty.

param.name: stateSaver

span.span: An used to save information needed to perform a rollback or uninstall operation.

summary.span: Performs the installation and writes event log information to the registry.

span.span: Performs the installation and writes event log information to the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將事件記錄檔資訊寫入至登錄，並將事件記錄檔所指定的記錄檔產生關聯屬性。The method writes event log information to the registry, and associates the event log with a log that is specified by the property. 如果記錄檔不存在 （並指定來源），會建立記錄檔，並將新的來源與它相關聯。If the log does not already exist (and a source is specified), creates a log and associates the new source with it. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 此工具會自動呼叫方法，在安裝過程中將與所安裝的事件記錄相關聯之登錄資訊。The tool automatically calls the method during the installation process to write registry information that is associated with the event log being installed. 安裝是交易式的所以如果在安裝期間沒有任何安裝專案元件失敗，所有先前安裝的元件會回復為其預先安裝狀態。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously-installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 這可以藉由呼叫每個元件的方法。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 使用註冊新的來源，新的或現有事件記錄檔，請勿使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法時擲回例外狀況屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法會略過註冊的來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method skips registering the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 應用程式的安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的屬性會自動維護已安裝之元件的相關資訊。An application's install routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`stateSaver`參數，會持續更新工具安裝的每個。This state information, which is passed to as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool installs each . 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

exception.span: The platform the installer is trying to use is not Windows NT 4.0 or later.

span.span: The platform the installer is trying to use is not Windows NT 4.0 or later.

exception.span: The name specified in the property is already registered for a different event log.

span.span: The name specified in the property is already registered for a different event log.

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter would install or uninstall the same source; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由安裝程式工具 (Installutil.exe)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the Installer tool (Installutil.exe).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Log { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Log : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the log to set the source to.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the log to set the source to.
The name of the log.

value.span: 這可以是應用程式、 系統或自訂記錄檔名稱。

span.span: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用將您在中指定的來源屬性屬性與現有的記錄檔或新的記錄檔，在本機電腦上。You can use the property to associate the source you specify in the property with either an existing log or a new log on the local computer. [Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)將來源對應到電腦的登錄中的記錄檔會使用此資訊。The [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) uses this information to map the source to the log in the computer's registry. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. 若要將項目寫入事件記錄檔中，您必須建立一個來源，並向事件記錄檔。To write entries to an event log, you must create a source and register it with an event log. 事件來源只能寫入一個記錄檔一次。An event source can only write to one log at a time. 安裝程式會使用值向您的應用程式事件記錄檔為有效的項目來源的屬性。The installer uses the value of the property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 如果您未指定記錄檔名稱，在安裝程式執行之前，安裝程式會註冊您的應用程式記錄檔的來源。If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log. 如果您指定新的來源和現有的記錄檔，安裝程式會建立新的事件來源，並將它與您指定的記錄檔產生關聯。If you specify a new source and an existing log, the installer creates a new event source and associates it with the log you specify. 如果您指定新的來源和新的記錄檔，新的記錄檔，在登錄中，安裝程式產生關聯新的來源，但直到第一個項目寫入至其中，才會建立記錄檔。If you specify both a new source and a new log, the installer associates the new source with the new log in the registry, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 作業系統會將事件記錄檔儲存為檔案。The operating system stores event logs as files. 當您使用或方法用來建立新的事件記錄檔，相關聯的檔案會儲存在指定的電腦上的 %SystemRoot%\System32\Config 目錄。When you use or the method to create a new event log, the associated file is stored in the %SystemRoot%\System32\Config directory on the specified computer. 檔案名稱由附加的前 8 個字元設定".evt"副檔名的屬性。The file name is set by appending the first 8 characters of the property with the ".evt" file name extension. 使用註冊新的來源，新的或現有事件記錄檔，請勿使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法時擲回例外狀況屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不會註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 如需詳細的事件記錄檔和來源行為相關資訊，請參閱類別的文件和屬性。For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the class documentation for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MessageResourceFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.FileNameEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
The path of the message resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定將當地語系化的事件訊息寫入事件記錄檔來源的屬性。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages. 事件訊息會描述使用者事件的應用程式定義字串。Event messages are application-defined strings that describe the event to the user. 您的應用程式可以寫入事件記錄檔項目使用的資源識別項。Your application can write event log entries using resource identifiers. 資源識別元編製索引中的訊息。A resource identifier indexes a message located in the . 事件檢視器會尋找並顯示目前語言設定為基礎的當地語系化的資源檔中的對應字串使用的資源識別碼。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定事件來源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法，以撰寫當地語系化的項目，設定訊息資源檔的來源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果您的應用程式寫入事件的訊息字串直接管理，而不是使用的資源識別項在當地語系化的資源檔，請勿設定屬性。If your application writes event message strings directly, rather than using a resource identifier in a localized resource file, do not set the property. 如果屬性不是本機電腦的識別項 ("。")，.NET Framework 會假設資源檔位於遠端電腦上。If the property is not the local computer identifier ("."), the .NET Framework assumes that the resource file is on a remote computer. 如果屬性值包含磁碟機代號，資源檔會假設位於\\ \\< machinename\>\\< 磁碟機\>$ 共用 (例如\\\server\c$)。If the property value contains a drive letter, the resource file is assumed to be on the \\\\\\$ share (for example, \\\server\c$). 如果此值包含字串 %systemroot%，假設資源檔位於\\ \\< machinename\>\admin$ 共用 (例如\\\server\admin$)。If the value contains the string %systemroot%, the resource file is assumed to be on the \\\\\admin$ share (for example, \\\server\admin$). 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 在程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和當地語系化的事件文字資源檔。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.

value.span: 訊息參數資源檔的路徑。

span.span: The path of the message parameter resource file.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用設定以使用當地語系化的事件訊息寫入事件記錄檔來源的屬性插入參數字串。Use the property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings. 指定在每個當地語系化的事件訊息屬性可包含插入字串的預留位置。Each localized event message specified in the property can contain placeholders for insertion strings. 這些預留位置會用來指定的位置和語言無關的字串，在事件訊息中的資源識別碼。These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message. 事件檢視器會將預留位置取代對應的字串，從及格式化當地語系化的事件項目在事件記錄檔訊息。The Event Viewer replaces the placeholders with the corresponding strings from the and formats the event log message for the localized event entry. 例如，訊息的文字檔案的下列區段會定義的參數預留位置的字串：For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` 在參數資源檔中，插入字串都必須定義資源識別項對應到預留位置，如下所示：Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` 寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入的直接存取的字串，則必須設定事件來源。The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings. 使用方法，以撰寫當地語系化的項目，設定訊息資源檔的來源。Use the method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file. 如果您的應用程式事件記錄檔中直接寫入事件的訊息字串，或如果您不包含訊息與參數插入預留位置，請勿設定屬性。If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the property. 如需定義事件訊息和建置事件的資源檔，詳細資訊，請參閱的 Platform SDK 文件中的 「 訊息編譯器 」 主題[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定新的事件來源的安裝屬性。The following code example sets the installation properties for a new event source. 在程式碼範例會設定事件來源名稱、 事件記錄檔名稱和當地語系化的事件文字資源檔。The code example sets the event source name, event log name, and resource file for localized event text. [!code-cpp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogInstaller_Resources#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlogInstaller_Resources/VB/source.vb#1)] 在程式碼範例會使用下列的訊息文字檔案，內建資源庫 EventLogMsgs.dll。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 訊息文字檔案是從其中建立訊息資源檔的來源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 訊息文字檔案定義的資源識別碼和類別目錄、 事件訊息和參數插入字串的文字。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. 具體而言，資源識別碼 1004年所定義的訊息會使用預留位置的資源識別碼 5002 所定義的參數字串。Specifically, the message defined for resource identifier 1004 uses a placeholder for a parameter string defined for resource identifier 5002. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation by rolling back the event log information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation by rolling back the event log information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的影響復原的方法。The method undoes the effects of the method. 如果在安裝專案中的任何元件的安裝失敗時，呼叫。 is called if the installation of any component in the installation project fails. 方法建立或設定事件記錄檔和事件來源的屬性。The method creates or sets the properties for an event log and event source. 請刪除事件記錄檔和來源，或預先存在的來源的屬性重設為其預先安裝值。 either deletes the event log and source or resets the properties of a pre-existing source to its pre-installation values. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 此工具會呼叫方法中，當這個或另一個元件無法安裝，安裝程序時已經做出任何變更復原。The tool calls the method, when this or another component has failed to install, to undo any changes that the installation process has already made. 應用程式的安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的屬性會自動維護已安裝之元件的相關資訊。An application's install routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`savedState`參數，會持續更新此工具會彙備份。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool rolls back each . 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Source : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the source name to register with the log.

span.span: Gets or sets the source name to register with the log.

value.span: 要與事件記錄檔登錄作為項目來源的名稱。

span.span: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件來源會指出項目會記錄事件。The event source indicates what logs the event. 它通常是應用程式名稱或大型應用程式內的元件名稱。It is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application. 安裝程式會使用值向您的應用程式事件記錄檔為有效的項目來源的屬性。The installer uses the value of the property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries. 新的來源名稱不符合現有的來源名稱或現有的事件記錄檔名稱。A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name. 每個來源只能寫入一個事件記錄檔一次;不過，您的應用程式也可以使用多個來源，以寫入多個事件記錄檔。Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs. 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔。For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files. 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log. 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。Device drivers should write to the System log. 如果您未指定記錄檔名稱，在安裝程式執行之前，安裝程式會註冊您的應用程式記錄檔的來源。If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log. 如果您指定不存在的記錄檔的名稱，系統就會登錄該記錄檔，但直到第一個項目寫入至其中，才會建立記錄檔。If you specify the name of a log that does not exist, the system registers the to that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it. 使用註冊新的來源，新的或現有事件記錄檔，請勿使用若要變更現有的來源。Use to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use to change an existing source. 類別不會修改現有的來源，以符合指定的安裝屬性的組態屬性。The class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties. 方法時擲回例外狀況屬性會比對不同的事件記錄檔，在電腦上已註冊的來源名稱。The method throws an exception if the property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer. 方法不會註冊來源，如果屬性會比對已註冊相同的事件記錄檔中指定的來源名稱屬性。The method does not register the source if the property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the property. 如需詳細的事件記錄檔和來源行為相關資訊，請參閱類別的文件和屬性。For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the class documentation for the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

span.span: An that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: Removes an installation by removing event log information from the registry.

span.span: Removes an installation by removing event log information from the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性值是`Remove`，則方法會刪除來源和相關聯的記錄檔，如果安裝程式會建立和屬性會指定建立新的事件記錄檔和來源。If the property value is `Remove`, the method deletes the source and the associated log that the installer created if the and properties specified the creation of a new event log and source. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只有[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)中解除安裝模式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) in uninstall mode. 此工具會自動呼叫方法來還原系統的組件安裝到預先安裝的狀態所影響。The tool automatically calls the method to restore the parts of the system that were affected by the installation to their pre-installation states. 這包括刪除與解除安裝事件記錄檔相關聯之登錄資訊。This includes deleting registry information that is associated with the event log being uninstalled. 應用程式的解除安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的屬性會自動維護已解除安裝元件的相關資訊。An application's uninstall routine uses the project installer's property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been uninstalled. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`savedState`參數，會持續更新此工具會解除安裝每個。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool uninstalls each . 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction UninstallAction { System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) should remove the event log or leave it in its installed state at uninstall time.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) should remove the event log or leave it in its installed state at uninstall time.

value.span: 其中一個值，指出哪種狀態時離開事件記錄檔解除安裝。

span.span: One of the values that indicates what state to leave the event log in when the is uninstalled.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您安裝事件記錄檔時，可以選擇性地將它連接到現有的記錄檔。When you install an event log, you can optionally connect it to an existing log. 如果您這樣做，您必須決定記錄檔應該還原為預先安裝的狀態，或保留在其目前的後續安裝狀態。If you do so, you must decide whether the log should return to its pre-installation state, or remain in its current, post-installation state. 如果您選擇以返回其預先安裝狀態的事件記錄檔，將不會還原至事件記錄檔項目，在安裝期間變更。If you elect to return the event log to its pre-installation state, changes to the event log entries at installation are not restored. 您可以重設只會與相關聯的事件記錄檔屬性為其預先安裝的值。You can reset only the event log properties that are associated with the to their pre-installation values.

span.span: contains an invalid value.

exception.span: The only valid values for this property are and .

span.span: The only valid values for this property are and .
